** 20 山木第二十

曰：¶

# dating: 8110

故人喜，¶
命豎子殺鴈而烹之。¶	KR2c0021_112:71a:3:18:2,KR3k0045_046:1b:2:17:2,KR3k0057_055:31a:7:3:462,KR4d0077_025:35a:4:24:58,KR4d0078_012:12a:2:20:30,KR4d0078_014:16a:11:25:58,KR5c0051_007:15b:7:8:1,KR5c0126_020:1a:13:1:1,KR5c0138_007:10b:8:17:2,KR5i0036_004:04p014b:6:25:4

「周將處夫材與不材之閒。¶	KR5c0126_020:1a:28:1:3

若夫乘道德而浮遊則不然。¶	KR5c0126_020:1a:32:1:3,KR5h0057_005:019a:8:5:22
无譽无訾，¶	KR1g0003_027:36a:1:11:30,KR1j0029_007:14a:1:8:40,KR5a0112_001:007b:6:11:5,KR5c0126_020:1a:33:1:3

# dating: 8110
若夫萬物之情，¶	KR2c0021_112:71b:3:16:2,KR3j0009_014:22a:9:42:6,KR3j0009_026:22a:9:42:255,KR5c0051_007:16b:4:19:1,KR5c0126_020:1a:43:1:5,KR5c0127_058:001b:6:16:2,KR5c0127_058:003a:9:2:2,KR5c0128_021:001b:7:3:2,KR5c0135_019:001b:9:2:4,KR5c0136_010:020b:6:3:24,KR5c0138_007:11b:1:5:2,KR5c0139_022:003a:8:1:5,KR5h0057_005:019b:2:3:23,KR5i0036_004:04p015b:6:33:4
人倫之傳，則不然。¶	KR2c0021_112:71b:4:1:2,KR3j0009_014:22a:10:4:6,KR3j0009_026:22a:10:4:255,KR5c0051_007:16b:4:25:1,KR5c0126_020:1a:44:1:5,KR5c0127_058:001b:7:5:2,KR5c0128_021:001b:7:9:2,KR5c0135_019:001b:9:8:4,KR5c0136_010:020b:6:9:24,KR5c0139_022:003a:8:7:5,KR5h0057_005:019b:2:9:23,KR5i0036_004:04p015b:7:5:4
合則離，¶
成則毀；¶
廉則挫，¶
尊則議，¶

食杼栗；¶

吾犯此數患，¶	KR2b0017_074:13b:3:6:1,KR2c0021_086:274b:1:16:16,KR4d0154_001:2a:3:15:12,KR5c0051_007:22a:7:14:1,KR5c0126_020:1a:228:1:32,KR5c0127_059:008a:4:14:29,KR5c0128_021:009b:10:14:2,KR5c0135_019:005a:10:15:7,KR5c0136_010:024b:10:7:28,KR5c0138_007:15a:6:12:2,KR5c0139_022:017a:7:14:19,KR5h0057_005:024b:3:14:28,KR5i0036_004:04p019a:2:7:4
親交益䟽，¶	KR3k0049_020:25a:3:11:3,KR4d0086_004:9a:1:1:20,KR5c0126_020:1a:229:1:32,KR5c0128_021:010a:1:2:2,KR5c0139_022:017a:8:2:19,KR5h0057_005:024b:4:2:28
徒友益散，¶	KR1a0027_012:4b:3:18:0,KR2b0017_074:13b:3:15:1,KR2c0021_086:274b:2:4:16,KR2n0011_019:25b:8:2:30,KR3k0049_020:25a:3:15:3,KR4d0086_004:9a:1:5:20,KR4d0112_027:8a:7:8:6,KR4d0198_019:14b:1:5:7,KR4d0370_015:18b:6:11:42,KR5c0051_007:22a:8:6:1,KR5c0126_020:1a:230:1:32,KR5c0127_059:008a:5:6:29,KR5c0128_021:010a:1:6:2,KR5c0135_019:005b:1:7:8,KR5c0136_010:024b:10:16:28,KR5c0138_007:15a:6:21:2,KR5c0139_022:017a:8:6:19,KR5h0057_005:024b:4:6:28,KR5i0036_004:04p019a:2:16:4
何與？」<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_020-10a>¶

『為其布與？¶	KR1e0041_008:17a:6:27:148,KR1g0003_027:37a:8:9:30,KR2b0017_074:13b:5:11:1,KR2c0021_086:274b:3:16:16,KR3k0008_018:11b:3:15:9,KR3k0045_037:1b:5:3:2,KR3k0055_247:36b:3:22:23,KR3k0056_004:18a:8:13:2,KR3k0058_082:2a:3:34:2,KR4c0045_001:46a:6:25:118,KR4c0046_001:38a:5:9:84,KR5c0126_020:1a:237:1:33,KR5c0138_007:15a:8:12:2

# dating: 8110
今處昏上亂相之閒，¶	KR5c0126_020:1a:299:1:43
而欲无憊，¶	KR5c0126_020:1a:300:1:43

執臣之道而猶若是，¶	KR2c0021_086:40b:6:10:6,KR5c0126_020:1a:332:1:47,KR5c0127_060:003a:7:4:10,KR5c0128_021:013a:8:13:2,KR5c0135_019:007a:9:8:9,KR5c0136_010:026b:2:16:30,KR5c0138_007:17a:8:6:2,KR5c0139_022:024b:3:9:27,KR5h0057_005:026b:4:9:30,KR5i0036_004:04p020b:5:15:4
而況乎所以待天乎！」<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_020-15a>¶	KR2c0021_086:40b:6:17:6,KR5c0126_020:1a:333:1:47,KR5c0128_021:013a:9:3:2,KR5c0135_019:007a:9:15:9,KR5c0136_010:026b:3:6:30,KR5c0139_022:024b:3:16:27

# dating: 8110
「何謂
无受人益難？」¶	KR5c0126_020:1a:318:1:45,KR5c0126_020:1a:334:3:48

# src: ZHUANG 20.7.6 Guo Qingfan 692; Wang Shumin 755; Fang Yong 539; Chen Guying 518
# dating: 8110
仲尼曰：¶
「始用四達，¶	KR5c0126_020:1a:336:1:49,KR5c0127_060:003a:8:11:10,KR5c0127_060:006a:5:15:10,KR5c0128_021:013a:10:4:2,KR5c0135_019:007b:6:11:10,KR5c0136_010:026b:4:7:30,KR5c0138_007:17b:1:27:2,KR5c0139_022:024b:10:11:27,KR5h0057_005:026b:5:17:30,KR5i0036_004:04p020b:8:1:4
